description: An exceptional value in BHPO. Attention Mid-Century modern enthusiasts and developers: Discover the perfect blend of architectural heritage and development potential at 9924 Beverly Grove Drive, a historic mid-century modern home for sale in Beverly Hills, perched atop a scenic knoll in the prestigious Beverly Hills Post Office. Surrounded by some of LA's most high-profile residents, including LeBron James, Lisa Kudrow, and Kylie Jenner, this star-studded enclave offers both prestige and privacy. Privately tucked away on a private road, this rare single-story residence offers breathtaking panoramic city views, exceptional privacy, and timeless design. Spanning approximately 2,582 square feet, the home features three spacious bedrooms, three bathrooms, and a striking indoor pool that creates a peaceful, spa-like atmosphere at the center of the home. The expansive living room was thoughtfully designed to take full advantage of the sweeping city views, offering a bright and open space ideal for both everyday living and entertaining. Set on nearly half an acre of prime Beverly Hills real estate, this historic mid-century property offers endless potential, whether for restoration or transformation. A pre-development study by a renowned Los Angeles architect outlines plans for a 5,300-6,000 sq ft estate across three levels. Developers may also benefit from the potential to lift current deed restrictions, opening the door to merging with adjacent parcels for expanded development opportunities. The current layout also presents cost-effective opportunities to expand the home's footprint and bedroom count, making it ideal for a developer or end user looking to maximize value in a highly sought-after location. Whether you're looking to restore a classic or build a luxurious custom estate, 9924 Beverly Grove Drive presents a rare opportunity to own a mid-century modern home with panoramic city views, exceptional privacy, and one of the few indoor pools found in Beverly Hills real estate offering a truly unique blend of architectural charm and lifestyle potential in the prestigious BHPO.

The viewer should independently verify the listed data prior to making any decisions based on such information by personal inspection and/or contacting a real estate professional.
